item.description: Look4: Two Powers in Heaven by Alan Segal View online much of Dr. Michael Heiser's work concerning early Jewish Binitarinism online at michaelsheiser.com also on YouTube
item.content:encoded:
Look4: Two Powers in Heaven by Alan Segal
View online much of Dr. Michael Heiser’s work concerning early Jewish
Binitarinism online at michaelsheiser.com also on YouTube

item.title: By: IH
item.dc:creator: IH
item.description:
There seems to be something of a publishing trend. Preceding this release, has been "The Jewish Annotated New Testament" (to which Boyarin contributed) and also Elaine Pagels' latest book, whose Jewish angles are highlighted in Gopnik's review in last week's New Yorker: http://www.newyorker.com/arts/critics/books/2012/03/05/120305crbo_books_gopnik?currentPage=all
While I'm writing, the just released paperback of "American Grace" includes a new epilogue with updated data collected in 2011.
item.content:encoded:
There seems to be something of a publishing trend.  Preceding this release, has been “The Jewish Annotated New Testament” (to which Boyarin contributed) and also Elaine Pagels’ latest book, whose Jewish angles are highlighted in Gopnik’s review in last week’s New Yorker: http://www.newyorker.com/arts/critics/books/2012/03/05/120305crbo_books_gopnik?currentPage=all

While I’m writing, the just released paperback of “American Grace” includes a new epilogue with updated data collected in 2011.
